author: bobbyshakes
title: Cardopoly Game Expansion
description: The Cardano NFT community is missing a platform to utilize NFTs, and engage the community in a real Web3 way. We want to modernize the classic board game experience, utilizing Cardano NFTs.

author: mark
title: The Platform as a Service for Web3
description: The Web3 barrier to entry is too high. The tech is too intimidating, the number of ways to contribute are too low, leaving 1000's of people on the sidelines trying to get into the game

author: futurefest
title: Fiat to NFT Payment Gateway
description: There is too much friction for the average new user when purchasing their first NFT, which restricts mainstream adoption of Cardano NFTs.

author: futurefest
title: Metaverse Jobs & Gigs
description: Players lack strong connections to metaverses, as experiences are superficial and socially shallow. Globally, individuals struggle financially to make ends meet.

author: futurefest
title: Cardano Virtual Convention
description: A large part of the Cardano community aren’t able to attend in-person meetups and conferences. There is not enough Cardano representation at these conferences.

author: futurefest
title: P2E: Group Progression System
description: There is no product on a Cardano that supports a gamification pipeline of enabling multiple users to earn NFTs while playing together.

author: mbarros4321
title: Real Estate Rental Marketplace
description:
The current renting system is archaic, costly, & driving housing costs up through speculation and lack of transparency.
There is no good data source to identify good landlords and good tenants.

author: jepzapata
title: PetLove Social Media & Marketplace
description: The pandemic resulted to unprecedented movement restrictions in most countries which led people to adopt online pet consultations and shopping. A need to standardize pricing and digitize pet records.

author: jepzapata
title: Unified Transport Payment Gateway
description: Need for blockchain global standard for Unified Public Transport Payment Gateway allowing secured & fair transactions using smart contracts.

author: tokenallies
title: Funding real world Businesses
description: It's hard for businesses and startups to get quick and easy access to funding, impeding many great ideas to be real.

author: deanwenick
title: Copper Seed Safe Token Plugin
description:
This proposal addresses three problems:

Increasing commerce of physical goods on Cardano.
Storing seed phrases safely and securely.
Helping independent stake pool operators attract delegators.

author: sebastiengllmt
title: Fracada Addressing Audit
description: Fracada is a fractionalized NFT project for Cardano. It was audited thanks to a Catalyst proposal in the previous round and now we need funds to implement the audit

author: dimitri777
title: Proof of Accomplishment on Catalyst
description: Many projects funded since Fund 1. No one knows re their progress, after funding. Allegations of projects funded but not completed.

author: this.tent
title: Distributed Idea Management System
description: Finding gaps that you can fill in the Cardano idea space is a difficult process. Current methods favor competition over collaboration. Current solutions aren't Cardano-focused or free and open source.

author: jpg.store
title: NFT Job Board
description: NFT projects are businesses that require multiple people to come together to create the artworks, community and handle the technical aspects of minting, but there exists no platform for such hiring.

author: mosiesburgina
title: Help The Poor Come Aboard!
description: There are not enough IRL and virtual cross community events for people with little to NO ADA to enter; on-boarding has become aimed at riches over showcasing Cardano.

author: konmaorg
title: NFTMarket for Disabled-Dextroverse
description: Physically disabled persons (people with paralysis) are not able to include themselves in web 3 communities due to the lack of navigating ability and emotional uncertainty.

author: cipherplex
title: Earthonomy™ Carbon Offset Platform
description: There is currently no platform for end-to-end carbon footprint computation and offsetting that makes use of blockchain to encourage participation, provide transparency, and validate green credentials.

author: crjarove
title: Food Traceability by Cardano
description: The lack of traceability and transparency in agri-food systems leads to problems such as inequitable benefits for small producers, environmental degradation and food integrity concerns.

author: konmaorg
title: SaaS3:Permissionless Oracle Network
description: There is no decentralised oracle solution that allows to bring real world data easily, instantly and securely onto the blockchain.

author: jpg.store
title: NFTs go Mobile
description: Over the course of the past 6 months we have consistently seen 50-60% of our traffic coming from mobile devices who can't trade or mint on the store without the usage of a separate dApp.

author: ashisherc
title: Typhon Wallet Mobile App
description: A mobile wallet that supports all features and is user-friendly, secure, and fast, connects with Ledger, and Trezor; is a must for users. Cardano lacks mobile wallet options for greater adoption

author: thehiddenorder
title: Create YOUR RPG Character with NFTs
description: Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) need more utility to drive long term engagement. As of yet there is no leading game on Cardano that allows for NFTs to be a character in a 2D Role Playing Game (RPG).

author: booktoken
title: NFT Books - Book Token Platform
description: By 2023, the world will have 1.11 billion people who read eBooks, but none of them own these digital books, and therefore there is no secondary market for eBooks or audiobooks.

author: lendingpond
title: Crypto collateralized loans
description: Users can not borrow against there ada in a non-kyc solution.

author: danrrodman
title: CH2O Africa - ADA NFT Charity 🌎
description:
We want to help provide clean drinking water in Africa 💧.
Charities are not transparent 💸, limited in resources, and wells aren't maintained.
~850k deaths/year -> 1-2 lives per minute

author: nebiyus
title: Telegram Wallet upgrade
description: The Endubis Telegram wallet requires more features in order to onboard a large audience to the Cardano community and the De-Fi world.

author: eliasaires
title: Improved Staking & ADA derivatives
description: Low active stake pools provide ~30% fewer yields to delegators than those with a higher active stake, making the barrier of entry for new SPOs insurmountable and consequently centralizing the network.

author: lendingpond
title: Leveraging Cardano Assets
description: There is no simple way to borrow against Cardano assets. To realize the value of an asset, one must permanently sell the asset. There must be a service where users can borrow against their equity.

author: yourjustice
title: Your Justice: Web3 Reputation Layer
description: The world is unfair in many aspects. Lots of interactions are risky, especially on the web: worker - employer/client, dating partners, etc. Cases of fraud, scam, cheating, bullying are very common.

author: despas.damien
title: Adaglass Platform: Deep Dives
description: There isn't a platform for Cardano's stakeholders to monitor and visualize the performance and growth of the ecosystem, and an investigative tool to help identify issues or opportunities.

author: newmindflow
title: Trybbles NFT AR Pets Prototyping
description:
Most blockchain games in development:

target hardcore gamers ignoring the fact that the majority of the audience are casual players
fail to convey the advantages of digital ownership to users

author: newmindflow
title: Trybbles NFT AR Pets Development
description:
Most blockchain games in development:

target hardcore gamers ignoring the fact that the majority of the audience are casual players
fail to convey the advantages of digital ownership to users

author: mushroommobnft
title: Cardano for Self-Care
description: The Cardano community often struggle to prioritise their wellbeing. Many want to improve their health, but don’t know where to start.

author: newmindflow
title: Trybbles NFT AR Pets Art & Assets
description: Most blockchain games in development target hardcore gamers ignoring the fact that the majority of the audience are casual players and fail to convey the advantages of digital ownership to users.

author: yojo
title: Tribal DIDs=Indigenous Sovereignty
description: Tribal identity systems, in place for millennia, are not yet recognised by states/institutions creating national DIDs, excluding indigenous population’s pre-colonial norms, rules, rights & sovereignty

author: mariapapadakh
title: Cardano Virtual Experiences Toolbox
description: Existing Cardano NFT marketplaces are static in terms of exhibiting NFTs - simple listings. Users are unable to create 3D virtual experiences within the marketplace and share with the world.

author: zuhair.abdein
title: Add ADA to 1st NFT Marketplace-MENA
description: There is no local NFT marketplace supporting local languages and categories to create and sell NFTs using Cardano Blockchain in the MENA region.

author: marek.stefunko
title: Uncollateralized crypto loans
description:
We live in a world where Banks and third parties control which company, institution or individual receives loans.
We lack a decentralised trust system for people to lend to deserving companies.

author: felixweber
title: Ledger Live Integration #2
description: A successful continuation on the Ledger Live - Cardano integration requires experts knowledge & development for a further secure, fast development

author: cardahub.io
title: Cardahub-One Stop Shop for CNFT
description: CNFT is exploding. But there is no Smart Contract-based One Stop Shop for everything CNFT on Cardano Blockchain yet.

author: bd
title: Wallet Integration
description: Goodwall constantly sends out monetary prizes to youth. It’s a burden to send out bank payments internationally and a lot of the fintech options can be cost prohibitive.

author: muesliswap
title: Market making bots on Cardano
description:
Market making bots are one of the most widely used methods to bring more liquidity to exchanges.
Existing frameworks for trading bots do not interface with decentralized exchanges on Cardano.

author: felixweber
title: Ecosystem Map-Community Wayfinding
description: There is a lack of data & visuals to help the community to understand & navigate the Cardano & Catalyst Ecosystem

author: albert.feghaly
title: PubWeave: Academic Publishing
description: The academic publishing industry suffers from a centralization problem. Few journals benefit from the work of millions of scientists who provide their services for free and even pay to publish.

author: bd
title: Digital ID for paperless youth
description: Millions of youth around the world lack legally recognized identification or don’t have the ability to use it in the digital world.

author: gchub
title: Mtidano: NFTrees 4 Erosion Control
description: Soil erosion is the cause of the degradation and fear of soil fauna and flora and is therefore one of the key elements of extreme disasters and climate change.

author: summertimechi
title: Be Love ❤️
description: People experiencing homelessness are stereotyped, stigmatized, and face uphill battles gaining stable housing; while Cardano needs streaming content that matches the empathy and love of its community.

author: victormundi
title: Valuation & Tax Reporting Tool
description: Keeping track of your wallet(s) value and profit/loss can take a lot of time. And setting up a tax report to comply with your country's regulations is even more time-consuming.

author: bd
title: Tokenization: Creator Economy
description: Crowdsourcing initiatives often have contributors with no remuneration or that do not have the tools to present a unified vision, as well as they see communities getting isolated.

author: bd
title: Community Endorsement formalized
description: Traditional labor market is shifting to serve the on-demand economy and workforce identity is moving away from traditional CV, but there is no tool or platform available yet to accommodate that shift.

author: victormundi
title: Following & Social Discovery Tool
description: Almost anyone investing actively in the Cardano ecosystem has experienced a rugpull or scam. And as Cardano grows, it will be even harder to find legit projects to invest in.

author: felixweber
title: Ledger Developer Onboarding Course
description: Ledger devices can increase the security of Cardano users and projects (through integrations). We want to make it easy for dApps and integrations to add Ledger support to their products.

author: kasimba
title: Atala PRISM DID
description: Accelerate the adoption of decentralized identities (DIDs) in the Cardano Community with an ID for the Republic of Uzupis.

author: victormundi
title: Messaging Any Address
description: Since setting up an address is anonymous, it’s very hard or even impossible to track down the owner of an address and send him/her a message.

author: nomica
title: NOMICA Incentive Platform
description: The world’s sustainability goals (SDGs, Climate, Green Economy, Finance 4.0) can arguably only be achieved on a global level through highly scalable projects with real, measurable impact.

author: qogwarp
title: Antique Tokenization for Fairness
description: Today, the value and information of antiques relies heavily on a few centralized platforms, resulting in limited opportunities to expand the value of antiques, a precious asset to humankind.

author: adaku
title: Well-being in Web3
description: We’re not speaking about well-being in web3 enough, and we need to. As exciting as everything is, we need to establish clear boundaries for well-being + actively seek to ensure mental/physical health.

author: bolaji
title: Unsung NFT Marketplace with DeFi
description: Unsung creatives are challenged with counterfeits, inadequate artwork provenance, extended time to market and inadequate financial services.

author: christopherhannan
title: ZOOMLOOK Luxury CNFT Platform
description: Worldwide adoption of CNFTs among brands and individuals lags significantly behind NFTs on Etherium's ERC721. The lack of achievement in CNFTs is negatively affecting the price of ADA.

author: thehiddenorder
title: CNFT CON KickOff Party
description: Cardano has the stigma of being the "lesser of the fun" blockchain versus Ethereum and Solana when it comes to events and parties on social media such as Twitter.

author: hardforqkafe
title: Hard Fork Cafe
description: There is a lack a community engagement on twitter and many other social media platforms.
